channel.title: Any client not working
channel.description: Any client that I download, my computer has problems running it. When I run it, it opens and loads (like it should) but then it freezes while loading. Mainly at the part where it says "updating client" etc. . Yes I am connect to the internet because I am posting this online. I have tried to pause my virus protection while loading the client, I have tried to quit utorrent, even quiting my internet browser. Please help! Thank you

item.title: Any client not working
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Update your java, see if that works.

Read full topic
